track.name: Mathematics
track.descriptions: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.

primary_contest.description:
Code your way to infinity and beyond by competing in Ad Infinitum 16, a mathematics programming contest. This is an unrated version targetting first-timers. 

On September 2nd, you’ll have 48 hours to solve 5 challenges.
primary_contest.name: Ad Infinitum 16 (First timers)

model.preview: Find the point on the line that is closest to the origin.
model.name: Solve Equations
